overview:
Entrepreneur & Business Development specialist. Specialties: Product Marketing, Sales Management, Entrepreneurship, Telecommunications, Mobile, Business Strategy.

Eric is currently the Director of Strategy & Business Development at Mobiroo Inc., where he is responsible for global product launch and marketing strategies across 12,500 points of distribution in 20+ countries.

Previously, Eric was a Lecturer at The Richard Ivey School of Business, at the University of Western Ontario (UWO). While at UWO, Eric co-founded BizInc., a business accelerator established to support UWO entrepreneurs. He is also a Director at Multiplicity Accelerator, a sales-focused accelerator and co-working ecosystem where he leads the intake/screening process for prospective portfolio companies.

Eric holds an HBA Degree from the Richard Ivey School of Business, University of Western Ontario (UWO) with a Certificate in Entrepreneurship.
